divs: sighting detailsi happened to look out of a window in my home and saw a unusual large light sitting above the mountains, approximately 30 miles across the san luis valley from my living space in crestone , co. on july 29, 2013. i grabbed a 10x50 bushnell binocular and saw pulsating red \ orange colors for approx. 25 minutes after which it faded away in a matter of seconds. the above happened between 9 and 10 pm same thing happened on july 30th, at 9:30pm i thought the light was a planet until it disappeared in a clear sky. the object stayed in the same place the entire time i was able to observe it, being so far away i could only see the colors and the pulsating of.
trends: There has been one other sighting in crestone
There were no other sightings in crestone on or around July 30th 2013
Summary: viewed large object 30 miles across san luis valley in same spot 2 nights in a row just above the mountains
